string-array.name: batterynoti
string-array.item: Duration in which phone will get Charged/Discharged
Time when phone will get Charged/Discharged

string-array.name: notipriority
string-array.item: High: Icon, Notification on top of certain apps
Max: Max priority, Always on top

resources.string: Click on the marked region to view and edit the properties of alarm.
To edit click on the property you want to edit. Example: To change battery level of alarm click on the battery level.
Long press to start the selection and delete mode.
Alert with notification instead of full alarm
Hack for devices which show percent in 10% increment
Found a bug? Tell us and we will fix it.

Info tab provides with the information related to battery like level, temperature and the estimate of battery span. Info tab also include a history graph to help you figure out the battery draining hours.
It will encourage us to build better applications.
Learn about features of Battery Caster

We are glad you\'ve decided to try Battery Caster. We hope you will love all the features the application provides. If you forget anything check this quick start guide again. For any further assistance feel free to contact us through the settings menu.
To toggle visibility of icon in notification bar use the marked switch in notification settings.
Play alarm even when the phone is in silent mode
To edit power profile click on the selected region.
To select any power profile click on the selected region of particular profile.
Long press to start the selection and delete mode.
There are 3 tabs, each one with different features. Swipe across them to explore them.
Welcome to Battery Caster - the most intuitive and powerful tool for your battery. Please read this quick start guide to understand the features this application provides.
Add amazing widgets to your home screen.
Any suggestions on how we can improve?
